org.tigris.noodle
Class TestHUC

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.tigris.noodle.TestHUC
public class TestHUC
extends java.lang.Object

This is a simple testing class that I used to test the functionality of the HttpURLConnection class. It turns out that HUC is really buggy and doesn't do things quite as expected.

Author:
Jon S. Stevens
